SELECT o.order_idx, DATE_FORMAT(o.rdate,'%Y-%m-%d') AS 'rdate', u.uname, p.pname, substring_index(op.oname,'+',1) AS 'oname', od.quantity, o.tot_price, o.payment, o.order_yn, o.delivery_yn FROM bg_product p LEFT JOIN bg_option op ON p.pidx=op.pidx
LEFT JOIN bg_order_detail od ON op.oidx=od.oidx
RIGHT JOIN bg_order o ON o.order_idx=od.order_idx
JOIN bg_user u ON o.midx=u.midx
ORDER BY o.order_idx DESC
